  • log10

log10¶

brg.numerical.gpu.math.log10(a)[source]¶

Base10 logarithm of GPUArray elements.

Parameters:a (gpu) – GPUArray with elements to be operated on.
Returns:gpu – log10(GPUArray)

Examples

>>> a = log10(give([1, 10]))
array([ 0.,  1.])
>>> type(a)
pycuda.gpuarray.GPUArray
